thread.title: BRIEF-Huabao International Says Unit Huabao Flavours & Fragrances To Issue 61.6 Mln A Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Huabao International Says Unit Huabao Flavours & Fragrances To Issue 61.6 Mln A Shares

organizations.name: brief-huabao international says unit huabao flavours & fragrances

text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Huabao International Holdings Ltd :
* UNIT PROPOSED TO ISSUE 61.6 MILLION A SHARES AT OFFER PRICE TO BE DETERMINED
* UPDATES ON PROPOSED SPIN-OFF & SEPARATE LISTING OF FLAVOURS AND FRAGRANCES BUSINESS BY PROPOSED A SHARE LISTING OF SPIN-OFF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
